channel.title: vim on sysid blog
channel.description: Recent content in vim on sysid blog

item.title: vimania-uri
item.description: Double-click open. But for VIM. Key Features Open URIs, html, docx, pptx, jpg, png, mp3, … Handle almost any URI Paste URLs with human-friendly description vimania-uri Why? One magic power of OS UI is the capability of opening URIs by just double-clicking. As a CLI worker using the mouse does not cut it, unfortunately. Markdown To deal with markdown a plugin is helpful, e.g. plasticboy’s plugin. It allows to create new files by adding a link [topic](topic) and then jump to it by typing ge while the cursor is on the link.
